name: Goose Lamp
specification: Chrome-plated or anodized aluminum gooseneck (12–16" long, 360° adjustable); height adjustable from 48" to 74"; weighted steel base (11" diameter); uses 60W incandescent or 13W CFL / 12W LED equivalent; 7–8 ft grounded 3-prong cord; UL listed; cool-shade design.
function: Provides bright, focused, and adjustable illumination for medical examinations and minor procedures.
usage: Use in hospitals, clinics, exam rooms, and veterinary settings for patient assessment and diagnostics.
maintenance: Clean with mild disinfectant; avoid abrasive materials; inspect cord and plug regularly.
warning: Do not exceed recommended bulb wattage; avoid bending gooseneck excessively; ensure base is stable to prevent tipping.
